title: Uplink (Ultimate Collection)
description:
This is the Ultimate Uplink Collection. The following appears in the readme from the person or group that made this collection (Antilag):

*******************************************************************************
                          Uplink Ultimate Collection
*******************************************************************************

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              General Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type.................: Game
Platform.............: Windows 9x/ME/2000/XP
Image Format.........: .iso .cue .bin




-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                               Post Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Posted by............: Antilag

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Ok this Contains the uplink CD + Bonus Disc + gamebible 1,2,3 and Diary 
hacker

Uplink 1.54 and 1.31 patches

and all decrypting tools i found for gamebible 2. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Install Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Mount or Burn the iso/bin/cue, install the game install patch

the key is in key txt in misc folder.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The following appears in the readme for just the original uplink game iso released by Slaxor:

                / You're a hacker working for the Uplink

      	  / ranks your missions will become more

            / servers to altering data in high security          
           / databases and tracing fellow hackers for other

         / gateway and  more advanced software. An innovative and  
        / addictive game.                                              
       |-------------------------= Slaxor =--------------------------|
        Greetings to all the other groups in the scene that have been                                                     
        supplying us with software for years, I'm glad I can finally 
        offer something too.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I found this collection somewhere and I am amazed at what I found. I've never come across an Uplink collection wherein the bonus (developer) CD was included! The really outstanding bit, though, is that this guy decrypted the gamebible stuff from the bonus disc. The Gamebible is sort of like a collection of images of notes that were kept by Introversion while the game was being created. Very cool to see someone finally decrypted all 3 books. Enjoy this FANTASTIC torrent.

P.S. Leave comment about how much I rock.
